result.reason: Regression where stored credentials are not automatically sent on connection; ClearTextPassword/UserName flow in RdpProtocol.cs likely broken by SecureString→string refactor or credential inheritance chain.
result.approach: Trace the credential assignment path (lines 833-988 in RdpProtocol.cs): verify _rdpClient.UserName, .Domain, and AdvancedSettings2.ClearTextPassword are all set before Connect() is called; check that UseCredSsp and AuthenticationLevel are not blocking NLA credential pass-through.
